a6d79e9d-4096-4b1b-8fe9-a56d858a0c6c.description: Powerful Women Today is an All-Female Global Consulting Consortium of Elite Women Professional Consultants, Master & Doctorate Level Clinicians, Certified Coaches and Mentor Experts. Our PWT10X program including a Speaker Bureau, Podcasting Production Studio, Coaching Academy, Masterminds, Lead Generation Campaigns, Masterclasses, Summits, Live Conferences, Virtual Summits, Wellness, Empowerment Circles, Career & Executive Coaching Boutique Accelerators.
a6d79e9d-4096-4b1b-8fe9-a56d858a0c6c.name: Powerful Women Today |Certified Mentor Expert| Diversity+Inclusion+Equity

badge_template_activities.title: All our Mentor Experts are Selected by Application.  A vetting process and thorough review ensures Powerful Women Today's mentor experts specializing in helping Women achieve Emotional and Financial Independence.  Grow with Us. Earn with Us. Lead with Us.

Our Certified Mentor Experts complete a 90 day, 100+ contact hour accreditation as a Certified Women Empowerment Coach.  This course is for those wishing to become certified empowerment and high performance coaches. Guiding the path towards ICF certification as an ACC. It includes The Certified Women Empowerment Coach Level 1 (6 modules) plus Level II for an additional 6 modules. Complete 30+ contact hours required for ACC coach certification.

Our Certified Mentor Experts are elite presenters achieve presentation mastery through Powerful Women Today's Speaker Bureau Certified Virtual Presenter program.  Receiving technical training and continued support through our monthly masterclasses and masterminds.

Through our PWT10X program our Certified Mentor Experts have access to four (4) monthly Masterminds & Masterclasses to ensure High Performance and Continued Knowledge in the areas of:  Sales & Lead Generation, Marketing & Media Promotion, Speaker Bureau/Association, Personal Empowerment & Diversity+Inclusion+Equity.
Our Certified Mentor Experts have extensive experience on their chosen modality.

skills.name: 1) Strategic Mindset & Effective Planning; 2) Leadership Development & Talent Management; 3) Bussines Finance

297e90c3-d9d2-4852-851f-5551a2d1bf89.description: Earners of this badge can skillfully coach women’s empowerment and confidence through Powerful Women Today’s 15 Step Program. CWEC understand that women’s decision making, investment and risk assessment are created by conversations that are congruent with their values and timetables. Earners are proficient creating awareness, designing action, planning goal setting, managing progress and accountability. Earners may also qualify for recognition of CCE through (ICF) Professional Associations.
297e90c3-d9d2-4852-851f-5551a2d1bf89.name: PWT-CWEC Certified Women Empowerment Coach

alignments.name: ICF - International Coaching Federation
alignments.description: The International Coaching Federation (ICF) is the leading global organization dedicated to advancing the coaching profession by setting high standards, providing independent certification and building a worldwide network of trained coaching professionals.

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of entire PWT-CWEC 30+ Training Hours
Pass an oral exam sufficiently demonstrating the ability to be a Certified Women Empowerment Coach in accordance with the standards of Powerful Women Today and the International Coach Federation.
Mentor Expert in Good Standing with Powerful Women Today
Complete required reading and self directed homework assignments and pass the program evaluations.
6 to 12 hours of being coached by a Certified Women Empowerment Coach
Diversity, Inclusion & Income Equity for Women
